text: Pal Joey is a 1957 American musical movie directed by George Sidney and based on the 1940 play of the same name by John O'Hara. It stars Frank Sinatra, Rita Hayworth, Kim Novak, Bobby Sherwood, Barbara Nichols and was distributed by Columbia Pictures. It was nominated for 4 Academy Awards in 1958. ==Other websites== * * Category:1957 musical movies Category:American musical movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by George Sidney
title: Pal Joey
